comments.author: TimeTeller
comments.body: Quote from: Bitno on October 02, 2022, 08:18:01 PMDaily airdrops and giveaways in the discord. Also we are looking for more marketing of our project feel free to contact us in discord.Are you willing to hold signature campaign also in the forum once your casino is up and running?Most of btc-paying campaigns you can find in the forum are sponsored by casinos and bookies. Do you think you can get out of alpha phase before this year ends, when it comes to your casino developments?What will happen if you haven't sold enough of your tokens? Do you think your casino will be up even without your crowdsourcing activities?I am assuming you will sell some of your premine to collect some funds to finance your developments, is that right?

comments.author: Bitno
comments.body: Quote from: TimeTeller on October 03, 2022, 07:07:23 PMQuote from: Bitno on October 02, 2022, 08:18:01 PMDaily airdrops and giveaways in the discord. Also we are looking for more marketing of our project feel free to contact us in discord.Are you willing to hold signature campaign also in the forum once your casino is up and running?Most of btc-paying campaigns you can find in the forum are sponsored by casinos and bookies. Do you think you can get out of alpha phase before this year ends, when it comes to your casino developments?What will happen if you haven't sold enough of your tokens? Do you think your casino will be up even without your crowdsourcing activities?I am assuming you will sell some of your premine to collect some funds to finance your developments, is that right?1. Yes we are willing to do a signature campaign.2. We will have the website up and running with login etc and userpanel for testing purposes by the end of the year.3. We do not sell any tokens. We are funding it ourselfs.4. We have premine yes, everything is public and posted in our discord.

comments.author: Bitno
comments.body: Today we are releasing Alpha v1.0.0 of our casino. We have implemented the following features.- Slots added- Games added- Signup Working- Register Working- Login Working- User panel working- Affiliate page up and working- Account setting page up and working- Vip page up and working.- And many more.We ask everyone to register look around and report problems/errors in our bugs channel so we can look into them.Also, we want to advise everyone this is just the first version of our alpha release many things will be changed and/or removed. Nothing that shows in your account info is set in stone. And some texts are just placeholder for the time being. Hopefully, everyone is happy with the first Alpha release and looking forward to your feedback either positive or negative.Link: https://bitno.casino/[/size]

comments.author: Bitno

comments.author: Bitno
comments.body: Our BitNo Faucet is now live. You can use the faucet 1 time per day if you are within the first 50 users after it resets. The following rules apply:1. You can only use your BitNo Addy once, after that use a new addy.2. Its against the rules to join with multiple accounts and or addys.3. The faucet rewards will be sent within 48 hours of joining.4. There is only 50 spots per 24 hours, so keep your eyes open and join whenever its up.Link: https://bitno.casino/Github with BitNo wallets : https://github.com/BitNo-777/BitNo/releases/tag/1.0.0

comments.author: bakasabo
comments.body: Does anyone else have troubles with BitNo wallet? I am running macOS version of it, and it shows zero active connections and states that my wallet is 17 week behind. I was advised to turn upnp in wallet settings, but that does not have any effect. I have decided to set wallet on a different OS, but did not find any option to get seed, private key or something of that kind to migrate current wallet address to a new wallet. Looking for help.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: Bitno on January 07, 2023, 07:25:13 PMBounty available here : https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5433282.80I'm surprised that you launch a bounty campaign without a signature campaign if you look around the casino signature campaign are ruling this forum because this is very effective for casinos to market their casino here in Bitcointalk, you should add the signature campaign people even outside of this forum are looking for casinos to play and the signature campaign is a good branding.
